opencard.core

Class OpenCardException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.io.IOException
          • opencard.core.OpenCardException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CardServiceException, CardTerminalException, OpenCardPropertyLoadingException, T1Exception

    public abstract class OpenCardException
extends java.io.IOException
    The base class of all checked OpenCard exceptions. The major exception classes derived from this one are CardTerminalException and CardServiceException.
    Version:
    $Id: OpenCardException.java,v 1.1.1.1 1999/10/05 15:34:30 damke Exp $
    Author:
    Roland Weber (rolweber@de.ibm.com)
    See Also:
    CardTerminalException, CardServiceException, Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      OpenCardException()
      Creates a new exception without detail message.
      OpenCardException(java.lang.String message)
      Creates a new exception with detail message.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Throwable

        fillInStackTrace, getCause, getLocalizedMessage, getMessage, getStackTrace, initCause, printStackTrace, printStackTrace, printStackTrace, setStackTrace, toString

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • OpenCardException

        public OpenCardException()
        Creates a new exception without detail message.

      • OpenCardException

        public OpenCardException(java.lang.String message)
        Creates a new exception with detail message. The message is meant for debugging purposes, not for user interaction. There is no support for internationalization of exception messages.
        Parameters:
        message - a message describing why this exception is thrown
